title: Deployments
description: Table with camera trap deployments. Includes `deployment_id`, start, end, location and camera setup information.

fields.name: deployment_id
fields.description: Unique identifier (within a project) of the deployment.

fields.name: location_id
fields.description: Unique identifier (within a project) of the sampling location for this deployment.

fields.name: location_name
fields.description: Name given to the sampling location.

fields.name: longitude
fields.description: Longitude of the sampling location in decimal degrees, using the WGS84 datum.

fields.name: latitude
fields.description: Latitude of the sampling location in decimal degrees, using the WGS84 datum.

fields.name: coordinate_uncertainty
fields.description: Horizontal distance in meters from the given `latitude` and `longitude` describing the smallest circle containing the location of the camera trap. Use for example when coordinates are [rounded](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Decimal_degrees#Precision) to conceal the precise location of an active camera.

fields.name: start
fields.description: Date and time when the deployment started, as an ISO 8601 formatted string with timezone designator (`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` or `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm`).

fields.name: end
fields.description: Date and time when the deployment ended, as an ISO 8601 formatted string with timezone designator (`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` or `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm`).

fields.name: setup_by
fields.description: Name or unique identifier of the person who set up the camera for this deployment.

fields.name: camera_id
fields.description: Unique identifier (within a project) of the camera used for this deployment (e.g. the camera device serial number).

fields.name: camera_model
fields.description: Manufacturer and model of the camera provided in this format: `manufacturer-model`.

fields.name: camera_interval
fields.description: Time specified between shutter triggers when activity in the sensor will not trigger the shutter. Expressed in seconds.

fields.name: camera_height
fields.description: Height at which the camera was deployed. Expressed in meters.

fields.name: camera_tilt
fields.description: Angle at which the camera was deployed in the vertical plane. Expressed in degrees, with -90 facing down, 0 horizontal and 90 facing up.

fields.name: camera_heading
fields.description: Angle at which the camera was deployed in the horizontal plane. Expressed in decimal degrees clockwise from north, with values ranging from 0 to 360: 0 = north, 90 = east, 180 = south, 270 = west.

fields.name: timestamp_issues
fields.description: `true` if timestamps for this deployment in `multimedia.csv` and `observations.csv` are known to have (unsolvable) issues (e.g. unknown timezone, am/pm switch).

fields.name: bait_use
fields.description: Type of bait (if any) that was used for this deployment. If other, more info can be provided in the `comments` field.

fields.name: session
fields.description: Temporal deployment group. Common sessions are seasons (wet and dry), months, years or other logical groupings when sampling occurred. For groupings without context, use `tags`.

fields.name: array
fields.description: Spatial deployment group. Common arrays are grids, arrays, clusters or other logical groupings where sampling occurred. For groupings without context, use `tags`.

fields.name: feature_type
fields.description: Type of feature (if any) that camera deployment is associated with. If other, more info can be provided in the `comments` field.

fields.name: habitat
fields.description: Short characterization of the habitat.

fields.name: tags
fields.description: User defined tags associated with the deployment, as a pipe (`|`) separated list.

fields.name: comments
fields.description: Comments or notes about the deployment.

fields.name: _id
fields.description: Internal attribute of data management system: ID of this deployment.
